     Crackfix Notes:

     This fixes a problem where saves could not be loaded without 
     restarting the game. 

     
     Note to RELOADED and their "Proper" ?!? release:
 
     Since when does any release group add legacy x86 versions of a game
     unless they are originally included (same depot) ? 
     If that is a proper reason for you, you may start propering yourselves
     on games like Taken-RELOADED, Endless.Legend.Guardians-RELOADED etc
     The list is long enough to make this proper just a silly attempt .
     
     Worst part of this "Proper" is though, that the RELOADED release
     has the same save/load problem as our initial release ...

     So just choose your reason why this "Proper" is invalid :
 
     a) selfmade rules they never followed themselves
     b) bad crack

      This crackfix requires:
	  
      Endless.Legend.Shadows-CODEX
      
  
      General Notes:

      - Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from 
        trying to go online ..
      - If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
        to run this game with admin privileges instead
